text: Marathi () is the language spoken in Maharashtra, India. It is also Maharashtra's official language. The written script is Devanāgarī. People living in Maharashtra and parts of neighboring states of Gujarat, Madhya Pradesh, Goa, Karnataka, Chattisgarh and Andhra Pradesh, union-territories of Daman-diu and Dadra Nagar Haveli speak Marathi. ==References== == Other websites == * Marathi News * MarathiMati.net - Marathi Language Web Portal Category:Indo-Aryan languages Category:Languages of India
title: Marathi language
